attributes.comment: I hope that CMS strongly considers the nomenclature it uses for this database in order to make it clear to the public the qualifications/titles of their searches. Perhaps creating a separate database for physicians to avoid confusion between physicians and non-physicians. Additionally, physicians are not "providers" and they do not have "consumers". Physicians are trained in the art of medicine and provide medical care to patients in a sacred partnership. Referring to patients as consumers perpetuates the undertones of disgusting for-profit motives in healthcare.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
